pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ecological Regression with Partial Identification // Estimate district-level bounds for 2x2 ecological inference based on the approach described in the forthcoming article Jiang et al. (2019), "Ecological Regression with Partial Identification", Political Analysis. Interval data regression is used to bound the nonidentified regression parameter in a linear contextual effects model, from which district-level bounds are derived. The approach here can be useful as a baseline of comparison for future work on ecological inference.
